title: Traffic Stop on a Busy Highway
description: A scene of a police officer approaching a stopped car on a multi-lane highway. Several other cars are visible driving in both directions. The road is lined with street lamps and trees. The reverse side of the photograph has text indicating it was taken on June 28, 1963, by Glenn Zahn and references the Cleveland Press.
